This webpage is about a 15-year-old boy named Brady Olson from Iowa who, as a joke, registered under the name Deez Nuts to run for President of the United States. While Deez Nuts is not a real candidate, Brady Olson managed to generate buzz and even poll at 9 percent in North Carolina. The article talks about his background, his plans for the future, and the unexpected attention he received. It's an interesting story about a young boy's playful political stunt.
